email_group_1.subject: Important: Update Your Benefits Information
email_group_1.desc:
Dear Employee,

We have recently updated our benefits information and it is crucial that you review and update your details as soon as possible. Failure to do so may result in a lapse of your benefits coverage.

Please find the attached document that contains the necessary information. Make sure to complete this by the end of the week to avoid any issues.

Best regards,
Maria Thompson
HR Manager
email_group_1.explain: This email is phishing because it contains an executable attachment and uses urgent language to pressure the employee into acting quickly.

email_group_1.explain: This email is safe as it contains a legitimate PDF attachment and does not pressure the employee for immediate action.
